content.description:
Read this public sign.

為了留住綠色，留住美麗，讓我們的家園更美好，我們不使用一次性筷子。

为了留住绿色，留住美丽，让我们的家园更美好，我们不使用一次性筷子。
content.question: What is the primary purpose of the sign?

choices.label: To promote planting of more trees

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
